column2: UPDATE post SET scan_count = scan_count + 1 WHERE pid = %s
SELECT u.uid, u.username, u.head_url, p.pid, p.title 	, p.content, p.publish_time, p.reply_time, p.reply_count, p.like_count 	, p.scan_count FROM post p 	JOIN user u ON p.uid = u.uid WHERE p.pid = %s
SELECT r.rid, r.content, u.uid, u.username, u.head_url FROM reply r 	JOIN user u ON r.uid = u.uid WHERE r.pid = %s
SELECT c.cid, c.content, u.uid, u.username, u.head_url FROM comment c 	JOIN user u ON c.uid = u.uid WHERE c.rid = %s
SELECT activate_code FROM user WHERE email = %s
INSERT INTO info (request_url, context_path, remote_addr) VALUES (%s, %s, %s)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post

SELECT u.uid, u.username, u.head_url, p.pid, p.title 	, p.publish_time, p.reply_time, p.reply_count, p.like_count, p.scan_count FROM post p 	JOIN user u ON p.uid = u.uid ORDER BY p.reply_time DESC LIMIT %s, 8
SELECT uid, username, head_url FROM user ORDER BY join_time DESC LIMIT 6
SELECT uid, username, head_url FROM user ORDER BY post_count DESC LIMIT 6
SELECT tid, name, content, image FROM topic
SELECT image_url FROM image
INSERT INTO comment (content, uid, rid, comment_time) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, date_format(now(), '%%Y-%%c-%%d %%H:%%i:%%s'))
UPDATE post SET reply_time = date_format(now(), '%%Y-%%c-%%d %%H:%%i:%%s') WHERE pid = %s
SELECT uid FROM post WHERE pid = %s
SELECT uid, username FROM user WHERE uid = %s
SELECT `mid`, `uid`, `other_id`, `other_username`, `post_id` 	, `operation`, `displayed_content`, `msg_time` FROM message WHERE uid = %s
UPDATE user SET scan_count = scan_count + 1 WHERE uid = %s
SELECT uid, username, description, position, school 	, job, head_url, follow_count, follower_count, like_count 	, post_count, scan_count FROM user WHERE uid = %s
SELECT uid, pid, title, publish_time FROM post WHERE uid = %s
SELECT uid, username, description, position, school 	, job FROM user WHERE uid = %s
INSERT INTO post (title, content, publish_time, reply_time, reply_count 	, like_count, scan_count, uid, tid) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s 	, %s, %s, %s, %s)
UPDATE user SET post_count = post_count + 1 WHERE uid = %s
UPDATE user SET head_url = %s WHERE uid = %s
UPDATE user SET password = substring(NULL, 1, 8) WHERE activate_code = NULL
UPDATE user SET password = substring('1572078811870cce06b469e2f492489e821677cd88662', 1, 8) WHERE activate_code = %s
SELECT password FROM user WHERE uid = %s
UPDATE user SET password = %s WHERE uid = %s
SELECT title FROM post WHERE pid = %s
INSERT INTO message (uid, other_id, other_username, operation, post_id 	, displayed_content) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s 	, %s)
UPDATE user SET username = %s, description = %s, position = %s, school = %s, job = %s WHERE uid = %s
SELECT uid FROM user WHERE email = %s 	AND password = %s
SELECT actived FROM user WHERE email = %s
SELECT head_url FROM user WHERE uid = %s
INSERT INTO reply (content, uid, pid, reply_time) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, date_format(now(), '%%Y-%%c-%%d %%H:%%i:%%s'))
UPDATE post SET reply_count = reply_count + 1 WHERE pid = %s
UPDATE user SET actived = %s WHERE activate_code = %s
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE email = %s
INSERT INTO user (email, password, actived, activate_code, join_time 	, username, head_url) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s 	, %s, %s)
